resources.string: Welcome to App Toolkit

Explore the capabilities of our AppToolkit library. Discover our applications, all built to demonstrate and utilize the power of our AppToolkit library, enhancing your Android development and user experience.
Discover our applications

App Toolkit introduces you to a selection of our applications, each designed to highlight different aspects of our AppToolkit library and enhance your Android experience. See what\'s possible with our AppToolkit library!
See our AppToolkit library in action
This app demonstrates how our AppToolkit library can be used to build versatile and user-focused applications. Explore our apps to see different features and implementations of the library.
All apps
Favorites
No apps added to favorites
Failed to fetch our app listings
What is App Toolkit?

App Toolkit is an application designed to feature and demonstrate apps developed by us using our AppToolkit library. It\'s your guide to exploring our ecosystem of applications and seeing our AppToolkit library in action.
How do I access the different apps shown in App Toolkit?

App Toolkit lists our various applications. Tapping on an app listing will typically provide more information and a link to install or open it from the Google Play Store, allowing you to experience it firsthand.
Are the apps featured in App Toolkit free?

Many of our apps featured in App Toolkit offer a core set of features for free. Some may have advanced functionalities available through a premium version or in-app purchases. Details for each app can be found on its respective Play Store page.
How can I learn more about a specific app listed?
For complete details about one of our apps, its features, and user reviews, please tap on the app in App Toolkit to visit its page on the Google Play Store.
Where can I find help or support for one of your listed apps?

Support for our individual apps is provided through their respective channels, usually detailed on their Play Store page or within the app itself. App Toolkit is for discovering these apps; for app-specific issues, please refer to that app\'s support options.
How often is the list of your apps updated in App Toolkit?
We aim to keep App Toolkit updated with our latest and most relevant applications that utilize our AppToolkit library. New apps or significant updates may be featured here.
Why does App Toolkit need permissions like Internet access?

App Toolkit requires Internet access to fetch the latest list of our applications from the Google Play Store and display their information accurately. It doesn\'t typically require other invasive permissions.
How can I provide feedback on App Toolkit or your apps?

We value your feedback on App Toolkit and our individual apps! You can usually find a "Feedback" or "Contact Us" option within App Toolkit\'s settings or on our developer page on the Play Store. Feedback on our AppToolkit library itself is also welcome through appropriate channels.
Is my data safe when using App Toolkit to find your other apps?

App Toolkit primarily fetches publicly available information about our apps. When you choose to install or use one of our listed apps, that app\'s own Privacy Policy will apply. We encourage you to review it. App Toolkit\'s data handling is outlined in our Privacy Policy.
